posts.post_content:
I have the following T202's in PSA that i would like to trade for similar graded T202's in SGC. Looking for cards with great centering in either SGC 50 or 60. Scans of all cards available upon request.

Stuart

A Great Batsman (Barger/Bergen) PSA 4
